original_text: And they led Jesus to the high priest. And all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes came together.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 끌고 대제사장에게로 가니 대제사장들과 장로들과 서기관들이 다 모이더라

sentences.original_text: And they led Jesus to the high priest.
And all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes
